name: Richard Night
description: Richard Night was born in Pasadena, California, and was the second of five children. His parents were both researchers atCaltech— specializing in materials science. Night showed an aptitude for engineering at a relatively young age, but when a joint venture with his college roommate —Romney Zukarian— turned sour, an angry Night shifted his major from engineering to business financial investment. Armed with his new knowledge of the ins and outs of business, Night soon regained his company from his old rival. Applying his backgrounds in engineering and investment, Richard soon founded — along...
occupation: Partner of HFN (fmr.)CEO of Night Int.Founder ofNight City
